name: The Entity Era
description:
The Entity Era

In The Entity Era, players will command villages from different Historical Periods by fighting, building their defenses and upgrading everything they can in order to destroy the villages controlled by the Entity.

Features:

- Turn based and real-time gameplay combination.
- Five unique Historical Periods with multiple levels to play through in Campaign mode.
- Elemental selection of Entity Powers and Upgrades.
- Exclusively designed environments and soldiers for each Period.
- Multiple new cards to discover during levels.
- Balanced rock-paper-scissors based combat system.
- Earn Entity Points to improve your capabilities.
- Complete the diverse Challenges in every level.
- Achieve Stars and unlock new Eras.
- Involving music and sound effects.

Developed on 2016/17.
